name: Slime Maze
description:
Slime Maze is a calming game that keeps boredom at bay. Just tap and swipe the screen. It's satisfying , relaxing and fun.

One-touch simple controls and addictive gameplay for the win!


Features:
Free to play
Simple fun control
Awesome SLIME
No wi-fi needed
